3.value: A beautiful brass refracting telescope from the early 20th century. Features a 3-inch objective lens and comes with original wooden tripod. The telescope shows fine craftsmanship with engraved brass fittings and leather-wrapped eyepiece housing.

8.value: Excellent condition. All lenses are clear with no scratches or cloudiness. Brass shows some natural patina but no corrosion. Tripod is stable with all original hardware intact.

images.caption: Main view of the brass telescope showing the full instrument on its original tripod

images.alt_text: Close-up of telescope eyepiece and brass fittings
images.caption: Detail view showing the craftsmanship of the brass fittings and leather-wrapped eyepiece
Close-up view of the telescope's objective lens showing optical clarity
